questions.question: 1. Which constant/s describes the effect of one species on another other?

answers.c: Both carrying capacity and competition coefficient.

questions.question: 2. Which of the following involves the competition of organisms of the same species?
3. In the absence of interspecific competition, how does the carrying capacity of species 1 change along the transect?

answers.c: It increases from west to east
answers.d: It decreases from west to east
